Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
13.06.2014 JH SCR18961 Added parameter PI.COUNT_LINENO to call og BID019
26.05.2014 GB SCR18924 Replaced task Delete irrelevant old advice and Delete irelevant adviceheaders by task Call BID707
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
14.01.2013 GB SCR17811 Extended selection
26.10.2011 GB SCR16847 Fixed problem with length of po.ACTION(BID700), added
missing test for BID700.PO.ACTION=12, changed picture of attribute for vpo.CATEGORY(BID700)
27.08.2011 GB SCR16698 Changed condition for selection (extended with CATEGORY = 17)
27.06.2011 GB SCR16559 Changed picture of attribute for vpo.ACTION(BID700) and
extended condition if PO.ACTION = 1 with if PO.ACTION = 1 or 12
12.04.2010 AK SCR13725 added new parameter when caling BID700 : pi.callProg
29.04.2009 SH SCR14580 Added test CRDB_ACTIONOTHERADV <> 'NA1' / 'NA2'
07.12.2007 AK SCR13188 prog runs now without a transaction on the selection part
23.05.2007 AK SCR12567 call BID009 at the end
21.06.2006 AK SCR11485 change the transaction level on the CRDB table to record
09.06.2006 JJ SCR11427 Added 'M'-argument BID019 call
07.06.2006 AK fix type error (no functional change is made)
31.05.2006 AK SCR11141 excluded Legal debtors from the regular Credman chain

Header.Description: run on old not handeled advice

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CRDB_ADMNO, CRDB_CLNTNO, CRDB_DATEADDED, CRDB_USRID, CRDB_CATEGORY, CRDB_DEBC_NO, CRDB_ACTIONDEBTORADV, CRDB_ACTIONCLIENTADV, CRDB_ACTIONOTHERADV, CRDB_HANDLED, CRDB_ACTIVEUSER, DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION, DEBC_DATDELETED, DEBB_NINVOICESOUTSTANDING from :1/crdb join :1/debc on debc_no = crdb_debc_no join :1/debb on debb_debc_no = crdb_debc_no join :1/ccry on ccry308_admno = debc_admno and ccry308_clntno = debc_clntno join :1/debh on debh_no = debc_debh and debh_hadr_country = ccry308_country where CRDB_CATEGORY IN(6, 7, 8, 17) and CRDB_HANDLED = 'N' and CRDB_ACTIONOTHERADV <> 'NA1' and CRDB_ACTIONOTHERADV <> 'NA2' and CRDB_DATEADDED <> ':2' and CCRY302_CONTINUOUS = 'N' order by CRDB_DATEADDED

Text.val: If (DEBB_NINVOICEOUTSTANDING = 0 or DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION ='Y') and
DEBC_DATDELETED = null : mark advice for detete
Mark advice for delete if it's not relevant anymore
Send dunning letter and Mark advice for delete
if action is still =3 then letter has been send : delete advice and go to next
update if needed old advice and if categoty is still the same
if category of advice is changed
